name: Plastic Sea Defence
description:
Save the sea whilst playing a game! A 2 day project made for my YouTube and for SEAJAM

CONTROLS

[CURSOR] To Destroy The Plastic

[Esc] To Reset Level + Quit Game

How To Play

  • Plastic will spawn in the game and will follow the path
  • With your cursor you must hunt it down and destroy it
  • If it reaches the sea in the middle you loose

Extra Information

If your interested on how I built this game in under 2 days and being my 3rd ever game, I recommend checking out my YouTube video which will be out at around 15th of December! There is some bugs which I didn't have enough time to fix but hopefully you guys still find it enjoyable!
